faq_teacher_level_test_question: Is there a level test before the class?
faq_teacher_level_test_answer: New members can take a level test during one of the two free trial classes. Please contact customer support if needed.
faq_teacher_fixed_teacher_question: Can I book the same teacher every time?
faq_teacher_fixed_teacher_answer: Yes, as long as the teacher is available, you can book the same teacher every time.
faq_teacher_flexible_schedule_answer: Class times are flexible. You can book at your convenience, but please book at least 2 hours in advance.
faq_teacher_absent_teacher_question: What should I do if the online teacher suddenly cannot attend?
faq_teacher_absent_teacher_answer: If the teacher does not join within 10 minutes, the class will be canceled, and you will be refunded. For further assistance, please contact customer support.
faq_teacher_correct_essay_question: Can the teacher help correct my essay during class?
faq_teacher_correct_essay_answer: If time allows, the teacher can help you correct your essay during class.
faq_teacher_prepare_question: Do I need to prepare anything before the class?
faq_teacher_prepare_answer: Before the class, ensure your internet connection, microphone, and camera are functioning properly.
faq_teacher_materials_question: What materials are used during the class?
faq_teacher_materials_answer: Teachers select materials based on your needs and level, discussing topics like current events, daily conversations, and content from platforms like CNN. They correct your mistakes and help improve your English skills during class.
faq_1_question: 1. How do I register as a student?
faq_1_answer: Click the login/register button on the homepage. You can register using Google, Hotmail, Facebook, or personal email. After logging in, fill in your personal information and purchase class sessions in the program.
faq_2_question: 2. How do I apply for a trial lesson?
faq_2_answer: Newly registered students receive two free trial lessons (25 minutes each) valid for 30 days. First, register as a student, then contact online customer service. Once your details are verified, trial lessons will be sent to your account, and you can book a teacher.
faq_3_question: 3. How long is each online English class? How many classes can I book at once?
faq_3_answer: Each online English class is 25 minutes long. There is no limit to the number of classes you can book as long as the teacher is available.
faq_4_question: 4. How far in advance can I book an online English class?
faq_4_answer: You can book up to 2 hours before the class starts. For example, to book a class at 1 PM, you must complete the booking by 11 AM on the same day.
faq_5_question: 5. How far in advance can I cancel a class?
faq_5_answer: You can cancel a class up to 2 hours before it starts. Canceled classes will be returned to your account. However, if you cancel within 2 hours of the class, no refund will be provided for that session.
faq_6_question: 6. How do I purchase class sessions?
faq_6_answer: Purchase various plans (monthly, quarterly, semi-annual, or annual) and pay with a credit card. Once the payment is successful, the purchased sessions will appear on your dashboard.
faq_7_question: 7. Can I purchase sessions in advance if I only have 1-2 sessions left? What happens to the remaining sessions?
faq_7_answer: Yes, you can purchase new sessions even if you have remaining ones. The remaining sessions will be combined with the expiration date of the newly purchased sessions. If the original sessions expire, they will be canceled. It is recommended to purchase new sessions before the existing ones expire.
faq_8_question: 8. How do I schedule a class?
faq_8_answer: After logging in, search for a teacher and book a class based on the teacher's availability. Once booked, you can check the status in 'My Classes.' At the class time, simply log in and start the lesson. You can also add teachers to your favorites for easy booking next time.
faq_preparation_question: What should I prepare before an online English class?
faq_preparation_answer: Ensure your device has a stable internet connection, a working microphone, and, if necessary, a camera. Reviewing lesson materials in advance is also a good idea.
faq_rights_question: What are the rights and benefits of students?
faq_rights_answer: Students are entitled to free trial lessons, flexible scheduling, and the right to cancel or reschedule classes within the specified time. Additionally, they have access to various learning materials and progress tracking features.
faq_teacher_question: What happens if the online English teacher cannot attend?
faq_teacher_answer: If a teacher cannot attend, we will notify you as soon as possible and reschedule the class or arrange another teacher.
faq_issues_question: Can the teacher correct my essay during class?
faq_issues_answer: Yes, if time allows, the teacher can correct your essay during class. Additional essay correction services are also available for separate booking.

courseInfo.title: English as a Second Language
courseInfo.description1: Course Overview: This diverse and interactive ESL (English as a Second Language) course aims to develop the ability to confidently and fluently use English in daily life. Carefully designed practical situation simulations enable students to practice and apply English in real-world scenarios, such as ordering at a coffee shop, shopping in a supermarket, conducting transactions at a bank, and participating in social activities. Covering a broad range of content from basic vocabulary to complex sentence structures, this course employs various teaching methods such as role plays, situational dialogues, and interactive games to make the learning process enjoyable and effective.
courseInfo.description2: Learning Outcomes: By completing this course, students will be able to communicate effectively and confidently in English in daily life. Focusing on practical language skill development, the course teaches students how to accurately express their opinions and needs in daily conversations, understand and respond to others' opinions, and maintain clear communication in various English-speaking environments. Additionally, it aims to improve listening comprehension and pronunciation accuracy.
courseInfo.description3: Target Audience: This course is suitable for beginner to intermediate English learners looking to enhance their daily English communication skills, especially adults and students. Whether preparing for travel, aiming to improve workplace competitiveness, or simply seeking to use English more comfortably in everyday life, this course provides a solid language foundation and practical communication strategies.
businessCourse.title: Business English
businessCourse.description1: Course Overview: This course is specifically designed for professionals who want to use English accurately and effectively in a business context. Covering a wide range of content from basic business vocabulary to advanced business communication strategies, it includes topics such as writing business emails, effective meeting communication, professional presentation skills, and business negotiations. Through real case analyses, business scenario simulations, and group discussions with classmates from diverse backgrounds, the course aims to comprehensively enhance students' English business communication skills.
businessCourse.description2: Learning Outcomes: Participants will learn how to communicate clearly and persuasively in English in business environments. This course places special emphasis on developing practical English skills for tasks such as preparing business reports, conducting business meetings, and communicating in international trade. Students will confidently and efficiently use English in various business situations and master the nuances of intercultural communication essential in today's globalized business world.
businessCourse.description3: Target Audience: This course is ideal for all professionals aiming to improve their workplace English proficiency, especially mid-level managers, entrepreneurs interested in international business, and professionals who frequently use English at work. It also caters to those preparing for important business negotiations or delivering presentations at international conferences, providing the skills and knowledge needed for success on the business stage.

platform_description: EnggleTalk - Your online English learning platform. Offering high-quality one-on-one online English courses, instant tutor services, and online English learning resources. With professional native instructors, flexible schedules, and personalized learning, improve your English skills easily.
platform_title: Professional Online English Education Platform - One-on-One Online English Courses
currentAffairsCourse.description1: Course Overview: In this rapidly globalizing era, understanding news events worldwide is essential for all learners. This course is specifically designed for students who wish to enhance their reading and analytical skills in English news. By interpreting reports from authoritative international media such as CNN and BBC, students not only learn about the latest developments in international society, politics, economy, and culture but also strengthen critical thinking skills. This course delves into the language usage and rhetorical methods behind different news reports and teaches how to identify and analyze various perspectives and the accuracy of information.
currentAffairsCourse.description2: Learning Outcomes: Through this course, students will acquire the ability to quickly and accurately comprehend English news and conduct in-depth analyses and discussions on complex current affairs. Students will learn to effectively collect information, organize facts and perspectives, and express their opinions and comments on current affairs clearly. Additionally, this course expands professional vocabulary and enables students to confidently participate in any discussion or debate.
currentAffairsCourse.description3: Target Audience: This course is particularly suitable for those who wish to deeply understand international perspectives and enhance global awareness. Ideal for students, journalists, scholars, and business professionals looking to improve their comprehension and expression of English news. Through this course, participants will feel more comfortable participating in discussions about major global events and demonstrate linguistic proficiency and knowledge of current issues in professional or academic settings.
childrenYouthCourse.title: Children and Youth English
childrenYouthCourse.description1: Course Overview: This English course for children and teenagers is designed to create a vibrant educational environment focused on enhancing language skills through storytelling, engaging reading materials, and creative interactive activities. From carefully selected children's picture books to adventure novels for teens, the course aims to spark students' interest in English and promote the development of reading comprehension and vocabulary. Role plays, storytelling creation, and team games encourage students to actively participate and learn English through practice.
childrenYouthCourse.description2: Learning Outcomes: In this course, students will learn how to effectively narrate stories, improve creative writing skills, and enrich their vocabulary through guided reading activities. They will think critically about and discuss the themes of reading materials, applying this knowledge to everyday English communication. Our goal is to build a solid linguistic foundation for students while fostering critical thinking and creative expression.
childrenYouthCourse.description3: Target Audience: This course is suitable for children and teenagers of all ages, especially those seeking an English learning environment that combines interaction and entertainment. Whether as a complement to school curricula or a special interest course during holidays, this course offers a supportive and enjoyable learning space where students naturally improve their English skills through games and exploration.
englishExamCourse.title: English Certification
englishExamCourse.description1: Course Overview: This course is specially tailored for students preparing for English certification exams such as TOEIC, IELTS, and TOEFL, covering all core content and techniques of various exams comprehensively. By combining abundant mock tests and past real exam questions with professional strategic analysis, this course enhances students' listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills at all levels. It places particular emphasis on practical drills and time management training, enabling students to remain calm and perform their best in test environments.
englishExamCourse.description2: Learning Outcomes: Through this course, students will gain a deep understanding of the structure, types, and requirements of various exams and learn to apply problem-solving skills effectively, improving their speed and accuracy in answering questions. The course also focuses on improving practical language skills such as vocabulary expansion, grammar structure enhancement, reading speed and comprehension, and writing techniques. Graduates of this course not only achieve desired scores in English certification exams but also demonstrate high English proficiency in daily learning or work.
englishExamCourse.description3: Target Audience: This course is particularly suitable for students and adult learners who need to prove their English level for academic progress, career advancement, or immigration. With personalized learning plans and guidance tailored to the specific needs of each student, this course supports students in achieving excellent results in English certification exams, whether starting from basics or further improving an existing foundation.
